person.name: Dupre
person.topic: 'tis an honor!Dost thou try to live honorably?It is a constant quest. Honor is like finely polished armour. Without constant care, it will soon tarnish!Fool!

person.name: Virgil
person.topic: Poison is my favorite.'tis it thine?Bravo!Well I don't care!
Nightshade may be found only near lat-J'F" long-C'O" only on the darkest of nights!

person.name: Publius
person.topic: I drink a toast to honor!
What is left when honor is lost?
Right, take honor from me and my life is done!Dost thou strive to live an honorable life?Honor gives greatness.No honor, no meaning!

person.name: Skitle
person.topic: I have seen the purple stone used in the altars of truth and courage!Ever been there?Good.It holds items thou shalt need.

person.name: Sailor Sam
person.topic: I sail the the seas of Britannia!
My specialty is navigation!Is it thy specialty?Good show mate!Thou must not own a sextant, eh?
Go to the pub in Jhelom and ask of sextants.

person.name: Aristotle
person.topic: Dignity consists not in possessing honors, but in deserving them.
Honor no one, but honor itself!Art thou honorable at all times?That is impressive.Strive to be as such.

person.name: Terrin
person.topic: A big one, with long, pointy horns!Is it gone yet?Whew, I thought it would get me!Save me!
It is buried in the southwest corner of towne.

person.name: Rigmore
person.topic: Yes, welcome to Trinsic city of honor!
Wisdom on the virtue of honor is found throughout this towne.Dost thou seek this wisdom?Enter and find thy path.This is the wrong place!

person.name: Winthrop
person.topic: There is a small child who knew named... Terrin.Dost thou know him?Ask him of the rune.Find him and ask of the rune!

person.name: Swindrik
person.topic: Spells of great power.Dost thou cast spells of great power?What is the most powerful reagent?Dost thou know their main ingredient?
Ask at the Folley tavern of mandrake.

person.name: Kline
person.topic: I seek entry to the shrine of honor!Know ye the two requirements to enter and use the shrine?What are they?What dost thou think?
A man named Winthrop knows of the rune!

person.name: Lexington
person.topic: The solving of quests brings ye honor!Strive ye for honor?Then solve quests but attack not non-evil creatures, and get not others gold!Oh.

person.name: Dergin
person.topic: I seek a place to rest.
I have quested long and hard.
I seek enlightenment at the shrine of honor!Art thou enlightened in honor?Good.The shrine lies to the south and west beyond the swamps!

person.name: a guard
person.topic: 'tis an honorable job!Dost thou strive to bring honor upon the peers?Dupre, the leader of our towne, joins many honorable quests!Dolt.

person.name: Quix
person.topic: About the purple stone of honor!Dost thou have the purple stone?Use it wisely!Seek it for it is very useful!
